org.apache.archiva.components.cache.ehcache

Class EhcacheCache<V,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.components.cache.ehcache.EhcacheCache<V,T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache<V,T>

    public class EhcacheCache<V,T>
extends Object
implements Cache<V,T>
    EhcacheCache configuration document available EhcacheUserGuide

    You can use the system property org.apache.archiva.ehcache.diskStore to set the default disk store path.

    Author:
    Joakim Erdfelt

      • hasKey

        public boolean hasKey(V key)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Tests to see if the provided key exists within the cache.

        NOTE: Due to synchronization issues, if this method returns true, a subsequent request to the Cache.get(Object) method on the same key might return null as the period of time between the 2 request might have been long enough for the underlying Cache implementation to remove the key.

        Specified by:
        hasKey in interface Cache<V,T>
        Parameters:
        key - the key to test.
        Returns:
        true if the key exists.

      • isOverflowToDisk

        public boolean isOverflowToDisk()
        Deprecated. This flag is ignored. The persistence strategy is always overflow to disk, if on.
        Returns:
        true, or false

      • register

        public void register(V key,
                     T value)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Register the specified value into the cache under the provided key.

        This Cache.register(Object, Object) method is just an optimized version of the Cache.put(Object, Object) method, but does not return the previous value contained with the specified key.

        Specified by:
        register in interface Cache<V,T>
        Parameters:
        key - the key to put the value into
        value - the object to place into the cache.

      • put

        public T put(V key,
             T value)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Put the specified value into the cache under the provided key.
        Specified by:
        put in interface Cache<V,T>
        Parameters:
        key - the key to put the value into
        value - the object to place into the cache.
        Returns:
        the previous value for the key, or null if the key contained no value.

        public T remove(V key)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Remove the specified key and value from the cache.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface Cache<V,T>
        Parameters:
        key - the key to the value to remove.
        Returns:

      • setConfigurationFile

        public void setConfigurationFile(Path configurationFile)
        Sets the path to the configuration file. If this value is set to a valid file path, the configuration will be loaded from the given file. The cache defined in this file must match the cache name of this instance.
        Parameters:
        configurationFile - a valid path to a ehcache xml configuration file

      • getConfigurationFile

        public Path getConfigurationFile()
        Returns the path to the configuration file or null, if not set.
        Returns:
        the path of the configuration file or null
